alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 10:33PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Bradford, northwestern St. Johns and central Clay Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1033 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Kingsley, or 8 miles southwest of Middleburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, Starke, Middleburg, Fruit Cove, Fleming Island, Kingsley, Picolata, Switzerland, Camp Blanding and Penney Farms. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay
